attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to continue Britain's fine tradition of supporting stem cell research by explicitly legalising and allowing (under suitable review and constraint) the creation of hybrid embryo's using human cell nuclei and animal eggs for the purpose of scientic research.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Support hybrid embryo research."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11137.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/hybridembryo/
